com.projetloki.genesis

Class TransformFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.projetloki.genesis.TransformFunction

  • public final class TransformFunction
extends Object
    A geometric transformation to apply to an element.

    Geometric transformations are immutable.

    Author:
    Cl√©ment Roux
    See Also:
    Properties.Builder.setTransform(TransformFunction...), MDN

      Rotates the element clockwise around its origin by the given angle, specified in degrees.

      Specifies a 2D scaling operation described by [kx, ky].

      Specifies a 2D scaling operation described by [kx, 1].

      • rotateDeg

        public static TransformFunction rotateDeg(double deg)
        Rotates the element clockwise around its origin by the given angle, specified in degrees. The origin is defined with the transform-origin property.
        See Also:
        MDN

      • skewXDeg

        public static TransformFunction skewXDeg(double xDeg)
        Skews the element around the X axis by the given angle. The angle is specified in degrees.
        See Also:
        MDN

      • skewYDeg

        public static TransformFunction skewYDeg(double yDeg)
        Skews the element around the Y axis by the given angle. The angle is specified in degrees.
